Class Particle

java.lang.Object
javafx.scene.Node
javafx.scene.shape.Shape
javafx.scene.shape.Rectangle
com.comp2042.view.Particle
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.css.Styleable, javafx.event.EventTarget
public class Particle extends javafx.scene.shape.Rectangle
Represents a single particle in the explosion animation effect. Particles are created when lines are cleared and animate outward with fade and translation effects.

  • Constructor Details

    • Particle

      public Particle(double x, double y, javafx.scene.paint.Color color)
      Constructs a particle at the specified position with the given color. Automatically starts the animation sequence.
      Parameters:
      x - X coordinate for the particle's initial position
      y - Y coordinate for the particle's initial position
      color - Color of the particle

      private void animate()
